title: Not a matter of “when” but “how high?”
itunes:title: Not a matter of “when” but “how high?”
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: The Federal Reserve announced another interest rate increase today. On the program, we’ll unpack the key questions on Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s mind as he guides the central bank in its quest to quell rising prices. Then, it’s back to Buffalo, New York, where we visit a food truck providing better access to fresh produce and reflect on what economists could learn from the people behind macroeconomic data.
